item.content:encoded: Several months ago, we cast Dan Hentschel in our upcoming corporate thriller short film Bandwidth (2025). On set, he was verbally and emotionally abusive to myself and many other crew members. Keep in mind, these clips are his behavior when he knew he was being filmed.
item.author: Pierre L'Fauex
